Cards.Name: War Dirigible
Cards.Penalty: Blanked unless with at least one Army. Blanked with any Weather.

Cards.Name: Sword of Keth
Cards.Bonus: +10 with any one Leader OR +40 with both Leader and Shield of Keth

Cards.Name: Elven Long Bow
Cards.Bonus: +30 with Elven Archers, WarLord or BeastMaster

Cards.Name: War Ship
Cards.Action: Clears the word Army from penalties from all Floods
Cards.Penalty: Blanked unless with at least one flood.
